SECRET.
G.T.6046
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 19th OCTOBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
S.E. of LE CATEAU the operations of the 4th Army have been entirely successful, and the line of the Oise canal has been reached from OISY to CATILLON. From there the line runs to BAZEUL?, (inclusive). North of the SENSEE further progress has been made and the general line reached is as follows :- BOUCHAIN - ROEULX - SOMAIN - E. to N.E. of VRED - TE? - LA MARCQ River to LANNOT - E. of ROUBAIX - ESTAIMPUIS? - ROLLENGHEM - GOURTRAI STATION.
The Lys has been crossed at COURTRAI and the town cleared as far as the station.
In Flanders BRUGES has been entered by the Belgians, and the French cavalry have reached the general line CAENEGHEM - AERSEELE - DENTERGHEM (E. of Thielt).
French Front.
On the right of the British the French have advanced in liaison to ETREUX, and have crossed the OISE canal between this place and LE GRAND VERLY.
2. ITALIAN MACEDONIAN AND PALESTINE FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
19th October, 1918.
Issued at 1900.
